userReviews.positive: we got a small balcony with a tiny view.
userReviews.negative: I was expecting a nicer room for the price. The King Suite was small and basic. Our remote to the tv in our room was  dead. The staff didn’t have a screw driver to replace the batteries so they had to break the back off an tape it back up… the remote still didn’t work when laying in bed, you had to stand directly in front of it to have it work. I would also like to add:  I did an early check in and even had my husband’s name on there as an additional guest. When he got there the staff was rude and unhelpful. They wouldn’t let him check in because they said his name wasn’t on the reservation… even tho I had the proof on my confirmation. I had to call and go through so many automated prompts just to talk to a real person on the phone, just so I could tell them that he has permission to check in. This was very frustrating for the both of us as we were trying to get ready for our wedding that day that was right down the street. Definitely added to our stress that we didn’t need. We are never staying at this overrated hotel and I am telling everyone I know not to stay here.

name: La Quinta by Wyndham Tucson - Reid Park
description:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at La Quinta by Wyndham Tucson - Reid Park! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.
Featuring an outdoor pool and a hot tub, this hotel is a 20-minute drive from Tucson International Airport. All rooms include free Wi-Fi. A free continental breakfast is served daily.
Each air-conditioned room features a sitting area with a work desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer at La Quinta Inn & Suites Tucson – Reid Park. A microwave and a small refrigerator are also provided. Select rooms feature a kitchenette.
Guests can take advantage of a fitness center and a business center at Tucson – Reid Park La Quinta Inn & Suites. Free parking is available on site. Laundry facilities are also available.
Randolph Municipal Golf Course is a 5-minute drive from the hotel. University of Tucson is 3.5 miles from La Quinta Inn & Suites Tucson – Reid Park.

name: Best Western Tucson Int'l Airport Hotel & Suites
description:
Best Western Tucson Int'l Airport Hotel & Suites features a fitness center, garden, a restaurant and bar in Tucson. The property is around 7.6 miles from Arizona Stadium, 8.7 miles from Tucson Convention Center and 4.9 miles from Pima Air & Space Museum. The property provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transportation, an ATM and free WiFi throughout the property.
The hotel offers a buffet or American breakfast.
Best Western Tucson Int'l Airport Hotel & Suites offers 3-star accommodations with a hot tub and sun terrace. The area is popular for hiking and cycling, and car rental is available at this 3-star hotel.
A business center and vending machines with snacks and drinks are available on site at the accommodation.
Pima Air Museum is 5.6 miles from Best Western Tucson Int'l Airport Hotel & Suites, while Reid Park Zoo is 7.4 miles away. The nearest airport is Tucson International Airport, 0.6 miles from the hotel.

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Tucson City Center, AZ
description:
Located off I-10 and 2 miles from the University of Arizona, this hotel features a lit outdoor pool. Free WiFi service is available throughout the premises.
Rooms at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Tucson City Center, AZ include a microwave and refrigerator. Cable TV and a work desk are also provided. Suites feature a separate living area and sofa bed. USA Today is delivered to every room each weekday.
A fitness center with TV is located on-site, as is a whirlpool. Free coffee and cookies are available day and night in the lobby.
Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Tucson City Center, AZ is less than 1.5 miles from El Rio Golf Course. The Tucson International Airport is less than 10 miles away.

userReviews.title: Love the staff, but skip the breakfast
userReviews.positive: Room is clean, comfortable, and pretty standard for this level hotel.  No surprises, and the staff is great.  Well maintained, or maybe fairly new.
userReviews.negative: My only knock on this hotel is the breakfast.  It has enough choices, and it is kept stocked.  The content is pretty standard for similar hotels but somehow...it just wasn't as fresh or as well done.  Juice was flavorless, for example.  Omelette was rubbery, waffle syrup was bland.  I wasn't expecting a lot, but it still fell short.

userReviews.title: Decent family stay for the price
userReviews.positive: Room was a great size for my husband and I and our teenager. We had to work during the day so the living room area/desk portion was great for my husband and I worked in the bedroom area near the bright windows overlooking the wash. Our son was either hanging in the couch or the extra bed. Breakfast was good. Could have a little more variety but for the price it was great. Loved the fridge and microwave in the room. I had asked for extra blankets and pillows (I'm always cold) and they were sitting nicely on the chair upon our arrival. The staff was very nice, especially Skylar when we checked in. Shower was great. Good location. Beds were comfy and room was spacious. Though we didn't travel with our dog this time, I liked they were pet friendly
userReviews.negative: Definitely could tell someone had been smoking in the room or nextdoor. Luckily we carry air fresheners when we travel. Floors were dirty - I ended up wearing my socks or flip flops whenever in the room. My husband's and kid's feet were black just from walking on the carpet. The bathroom floor had some leftover trash or makeup or something on the floor. I put a towel over it so it wouldn't get over our stuff. The shower curtain had some rips and tears in it. When the Air conditioning kicks on, it definitely had a musty smell...may need to check that.

userReviews.negative:

And couldn't find my reservation.
userReviews.room: Queen Room with Two Queen Beds

name: Sonesta Select Tucson Airport
description:
Featuring a seasonal outdoor pool, this hotel is 15 minutes’ drive from The University of Arizona. All rooms are equipped with free Wi-Fi.
Each air-conditioned room offers a seating area with a work desk and a flat-screen cable TV with pay-per-view channels at Sonesta Select Tucson Airport. A small refrigerator, coffee-making facilities and an private bathroom with a hairdryer are also included.
A free transfer service to Tucson International Airport is offered daily. Guests can take advantage of a business center and a fitness center at Sonesta Select Tucson Airport. Free parking is provided.
Davis-Monathan Air Force Base is 10 minutes’ drive from the hotel. Pima Air & Space Museum 4.7 mi from Sonesta Select Tucson Airport.

name: The Citizen Hotel
description:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at The Citizen Hotel! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.
Located in Tucson and within a 11-minute walk of Tucson Convention Center, The Citizen Hotel has a bar, allergy-free rooms, and free WiFi throughout the property. The property is around 2 miles from Arizona Stadium, 3.7 miles from Reid Park Zoo and 11 miles from Pima Air & Space Museum. Pima Air Museum is 12 miles from the hotel and Tucson Raceway Park is 16 miles away.
The rooms is fitted with air conditioning, a fridge, a microwave, an electric tea pot, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. The private bathroom is equipped with a bath, a hairdryer and slippers. At the hotel rooms contain bed linen and towels.
Popular points of interest near The Citizen Hotel include Tucson Museum of Art, Rialto Theatre and Tucson City Hall. The nearest airport is Tucson International Airport, 6.8 miles from the accommodation.

address.full: 82 South Stone Avenue, Tucson, AZ 85701, United States of America

name: Days Inn by Wyndham Tucson City Center
description:
Located off Interstate 10 just 2.1 mi from the University of Arizona, this Tucson hotel features an outdoor pool. Free WiFi and a daily continental breakfast with make-your-own-waffles are included.
A microwave and small fridge are provided in all rooms at the Days Inn by Wyndham Tucson City Center. Each air-conditioned room includes a cable TV, coffee maker and work desk.
A business center is offered to all guests and fax services are available. Weekday newspapers and free parking for large vehicles are also included.
Tucson Museum of Art and the Tucson Convention Center are both 5 minutes’ drive from the Days Inn by Wyndham Tucson City Center. Tucson International Airport is 8.1 mi away.

address.full: 665 North Freeway, Tucson, AZ 85745, United States of America

name: Residence Inn Tucson Airport
description:
Located 20 minutes south of The University of Arizona and downtown Tucson, Arizona, this all-suite hotel features a sauna, outdoor pool, and free shuttle service to/from Tucson International Airport.
The suites at the Tucson Airport Residence Inn has a sitting area with a sofa and flat-screen TV.  The kitchen is complete with a stove-top, oven, and dishwasher.  Cookware and dishware are provided.
A sports court, gym, and a hot tub make up part of the facilities at this Tucson hotel.  Concierge and dry cleaning services are available.  A continental breakfast is served every morning.
Casino Del Sol is 25 minutes from Residence Inn Tucson Airport.  The Tucson Convention Center is 20 minutes from the hotel.

name: The Westin La Paloma Resort & Spa
description:
Surrounded by the breathtaking Catalina Mountains, this Tucson resort and spa features luxurious amenities and facilities, first-class service, exceptional accommodations, all in an unrivaled location.
There is always something to do when at The Westin La Paloma Resort & Spa. With an on-site top-rated 27 hole golf course, 5 spacious swimming pools, 10 tennis courts, and a yoga and Pilates studio, there is something for everyone.
After a long day, guests at the La Paloma Westin can relax with a massage from the spa,  take advantage of exclusive access to the private La Paloma Country Club or simply enjoy the panoramic views from private balconies or patios.

name: Motel 6 Tucson, AZ - East Williams Center
description:
Featuring a seasonal outdoor pool, this Arizona hotel is 15 minutes’ drive from Tucson Civic Center.  It offers air conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and serves a daily continental breakfast. Laundry facilities is located on site.
Each guest room at Motel 6 Tucson, AZ - East Williams Center features a satellite TV, a microwave and a refrigerator. Rooms include tea and coffee-making facilities and a hairdryer.
This pet-friendly hotel offers fax and photocopying services. Vending machines featuring snacks and drinks are located on site.
Dorado Country Club Golf Course is 10 minutes’ drive from this hotel. Mount Lemmon Ski Valley is 7 miles away.

address.full: 1990 South Craycroft Road, Tucson, AZ 85711, United States of America

userReviews.title: Excellent Service and Substantial Quality
userReviews.positive:
I loved how friendly the staff was at this location. Bit of an inconvenience that one entrance by car is closed. I'm sure the gate being closed is more for security which I am perfectly fine with. 
The room was clean and smelled clean with no fragrances sprayed which I enjoyed. The light smell of bleach, confirming to me that the room was hand cleaned and no deodorizer was used to cover up smells, was reassuring. I was absolutely thrilled to be in a non smoking room that didn't smell like cigarettes.
userReviews.negative: The door did stick when I returned my room. I suppose the door handle locking and unlocking mechanism is worn. Had to make sure the handle was in just the right position when swiping my key card to get it to unlock my door. This is less of a "didn't like" and more a comment that the door unlocking mechanism is a little fiddly yet not an issue for me at all.

name: Holiday Inn Express Tucson-Airport, an IHG Hotel
description:
A free breakfast is available at this Tucson, Arizona hotel. Every room includes free Wi-Fi and the hotel has a free shuttle to the Tucson International Airport.
A flat-screen satellite TV is available in all rooms at the Holiday Inn Express Tucson-Airport. A microwave, coffee-machine, and small fridge are also available.
The Tucson Holiday Inn Express features an outdoor pool and on-site barbecue grills. A fitness center and business center are also included. Dry cleaning and laundry services are available.
The University of Arizona is a 25-minute drive from the Tucson-Airport Holiday Inn Express. Casino Del Sol is a 30-minute drive away. The Pima Air and Space Museum is a 15-minute drive from the property.

name: Motel 6-Tucson, AZ-Downtown
description:
Located just off Interstate 10, this hotel is 1 miles from both the Tucson Convention Center and Sentinel Peak Park.
Free Wi-Fi access and cable TV are included in every room at Motel 6 Tucson, AZ. Rooms are also furnished with a desk.
The lobby has a 24-hour reception and a cash machine.
Central Tucson is 4 miles from the Motel 6 Tucson, AZ Downtown. Rialto Theater is 2 miles away.

userReviews.title: Fair
userReviews.positive: Staff was friendly.
userReviews.negative:
We got stuck in traffic and delayed our trip to our destination, and everything else was booked or over $ 300/night. We needed to be back on the road by 8 am. So it seemed smart to book an $83 room.This was the closest to the freeway. The reviews were ok, so I booked while my partner drove. We're exhausted at the time.
We get there around 1:40 a.m., and the area does not look safe. within 2 mins of entering the building to check in, the police arrived and were  looking for a person for some time assault??
 The area is not the best... people on drugs walking around at 2am.thin walls. Just no. Avoid. 
The restroom tub was gross with some type of dark color  residue.
The bed was comfy but would make noise when  you moved or got out of bed. 
Thin walls....light sleeper beware. We fell asleep closer  to 2:30am and woke up a bit after 6am. because people were drinking in the front  near our room and being loud. 😆. 
The parking is right in front of the rooms and you can hear when ppl park and open doors.
My partner and I laughed about the whole situation, but next time, we'll know to spend the extra $ for 4-6 hr stay at a hotel, lol
Just avoid overall.
userReviews.room: Deluxe Queen Room with Two Queen Beds

name: The Tuxon Hotel, Tucson, a Member of Design Hotels
description:
Set in Tucson, 1.6 mi from Tucson Convention Center, The Tuxon has an outdoor swimming pool and rooms with free WiFi access. The property is around 3.7 mi from Arizona Stadium and 1.7 mi from Tucson Museum of Art. The property is located 4.3 mi from Reid Park Zoo.
At the hotel, the rooms come with a desk and a TV. The private bathroom is fitted with free toiletries. Guest rooms at The Tuxon feature air conditioning and a wardrobe.
The accommodations offers a terrace.
Staff at the 24-hour front desk can help with information about the area.
Pima Air & Space Museum is 9.9 mi from The Tuxon, while Pima Air Museum is 11 mi from the property. The nearest airport is Tucson International Airport, 8.1 mi from the property.

If you like to get out and ride bikes, it’s very close to the trails, and they rent good bikes right on site. A lovely stay.

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Tucson Airport, AZ
description:
Located 7.5 mi from the University of Arizona and the city center of Tucson, this hotel offers a free airport shuttle service to the Tucson International Airport. Rooms feature free WiFi. A free hot breakfast is served daily.
Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Tucson Airport, AZ rooms are equipped with seating area and coffee maker. The rooms have air conditioning and a flat-screen cable TV.
Guests at Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Tucson Airport, AZ can swim in the outdoor pool or work out in the fitness center.
Pima Air & Space Museum is 4.3 mi from the accommodations, while Pima Air Museum is 4.3 mi from the property. The nearest airport is Tucson International Airport, 1.2 mi from Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Tucson Airport, AZ.

name: TownePlace Suites Tucson Airport
description:
TownePlace Suites Tucson offers modern accommodations 8 miles from central Tucson and 2 miles from the airport. It features a tennis court, an outdoor pool with a hot tub and a well-equipped gym.
Rooms come with free Wi-Fi, large flat-screen TVs and a sitting area with couch. They also include a spacious work desk with ergonomic chair and some rooms are complete with kitchen.
Guests can enjoy a hot daily breakfast served at the restaurant of the hotel. Outdoor dining is possible thanks to on-site barbecue facilities and 24/7 vending machines provide refreshments and snacks.
Popular nearby attractions include Davis-Monthan Air Force Base with its airplanes cemetery and the leisure Lakeside Lake, both within a 10 minute drive from the TownePlace Suites Tucson Airport.

name: Sheraton Tucson Hotel & Suites
description:
This hotel is one block from the Tucson Medical Center. Guests can relax in the hotel's hot tub. Rooms include cable TV and free Wi-Fi and an outdoor pool is on site.
Every room at the Sheraton Tucson Hotel & Suites includes a refrigerator and a coffee maker. For guests’ convenience a hairdryer and ironing facilities are also provided in each room.
The Tucson Sheraton Hotel & Suites features a modern gym. the Glowbal, the on-site restaurant, serves Arizona-style cuisine. Guests can relax by the outdoor fire pits and watch local performers.
The University of Arizona is 5 miles from the Sheraton Hotel & Suites Tucson. Davis-Monthan Air Force Base is 6 miles away.

Loud noise whenever the heater kicked on and off. Really loud.. 
Sink backed up from the above renters shower.  They had to snake it. Whole room stank for hours. Bathroom door refused to stay closed without slamming it. So it was loud at night when someone was sleeping.

userReviews.title: Ok stay.
userReviews.negative:
The other residents were extremely loud banging doors, yelling, and running up and down the hallways past 10 o'clock at night. They were adults & seemed to have a party going on next door. They were eventually told to be quiet from staff around 11 o'clock and were quiet after that. 
Normally, this wouldn't bother me but I was taking a BIG licensing exam the next morning & needed all the sleep I could get. It was the reason I was staying here. 
Also, I felt a bit unsafe as a single female staying here because of the large gap between the door frame & flooring... there was not a seal & created a large gap in the threshold. It would have been very easy for someone to shimmy something between the door frame & open the door. I placed a chair in front of the door to alert me if someone were to gain access to the room.

name: Staybridge Suites Tucson Airport, an IHG Hotel
description:
This hotel in Arizona is located less than one mile from Tucson International Airport. It features fully equipped kitchenettes in each suite and includes an outdoor pool and 24-hour gym.
Suites at Staybridge Suites Tucson Airport include flat-screen cable TVs. The kitchenettes provide a refrigerator, microwave and kitchenware.
The hotel offers a 24-hour business center. Tucson Airport Staybridge Suites offers on-site laundry facilities.
The University of Arizona is 6 miles from Staybridge Suites Tucson. Desert Diamond Casino is 3 miles away and guests are 7 miles from the Tucson Convention Center.

userReviews.negative: I had call a month before, a week before, three days before and 5 hours before arriving to make sure my reservations was good for arriving at 3am on dec 22. They told me all good for when I arrive. Unfortunately when I arrived the night desk person said sorry we over booked we have know rooms I dont know what to tell you. I told him I'm staying here for 8 days paying over 1200 bucks my room better be ready.  Night clerk threw day staff under the bus by saying there are know notes in the system about me calling at all. I told him to call and wake up the manager of the hotel. Then oh my he had a smaller room he could put me in until 900 am when manager got in on dce 22. Manger did apologize they  comped me the first night and move me to my correct king 2 bedroom suite. I feel that after driving 14 hrs to get there, checking and rechecking on my reservations multiple times this should not have happened. Next time may I will stay at embassy suites.

name: Best Western Gold Poppy Inn
description:
Conveniently located off Interstate 10, this Tucson, Arizona hotel features a year round outdoor pool and hot tub, has guest rooms with free Wi-Fi and serves a daily continental breakfast. Tucson Convention Center is 15 minutes’ drive away.
Best Western Gold Poppy Inn offers air-conditioned rooms equipped with a cable TV, a microwave and a refrigerator. Each room includes a work desk and tea and coffee-making facilities.
A fitness center with cardiovascular equipment is offered on-site at Gold Poppy Best Western Plus. 24-hour reception and a business center with fax and photocopying services are also available.
Old Tucson Studios are 15 miles away from this hotel.  Saguaro National Park is 26 miles away.

name: Courtyard Tucson Airport
description:
This recently renovated Tucson hotel offers an outdoor courtyard pool and free WiFi throughout the property.
Each spacious room includes Smart TV and a seating area. Courtyard Tucson Airport offers guests luxury accommodations fitted with modern furnishings.
Guests can enjoy a workout in the hotel’s well-equipped gym. A 24-hour front desk is available at Tucson Airport Courtyard.
At The Bistro - Eat. Drink. Connect. guests can enjoy healthy food and beverage options during the morning and dinner, including Starbucks coffee. During the evening, guests can sample beer, wine or cocktails. Also available is a 24-7 Market with snacks, drinks and meals on-the-go.
Pima Air & Space Museum is a 7-minute drive from the hotel.

userReviews.title: I would return
userReviews.positive: Comfortable king bed and sleeper sofa. Good AC unit with wall thermostat. Dining and gas station within walking distance. Gorgeous facilities and updated rooms. I didn't use the breakfast area, but coffee and danishes were on the menu. (Call ahead if curious about breakfast) I used white noise to drown out the sound of airplanes and it was otherwise quiet. Staff is very friendly. On call shuttle was helpful. I would stay here again.
userReviews.negative: No housekeeping during my 4 night stay in April '21 due to the lingering pandemic hysteria, however I was able to receive bedding and towels with a phonecall. No microwave in room but one is in the lobby. The location is very far from Tucson central and Tucson west where I had business and in a sketchy part of town. Mushy pillows. Poorly stocked snacks in lobby market. Tv in room doesn't face bed and isn't centered to sofa so it was impossible to watch comfortably, even when pulled out on the adjustable arm. With tax, I paid over $100 a night, which I think is too expensive for this area but you're paying for being close to the airport, and unfortunately where I was doing my business I had no other closer alternative unless I stayed at the casino.

name: Motel 6 Tucson, AZ - North
description:
Featuring an outdoor pool, this Arizona motel is 18 miles from Tucson International Airport. All rooms include cable TV with extended channels. Laundry facilities is located on site. Free WiFi is provided.
Each air-conditioned room at Motel 6 Tucson, AZ - North features an private bathroom. All rooms boast vibrant décor and light wood furnishings.
Fax and photocopying services and 24-hour reception are available at Tucson North Motel 6.  A sun terrace is also available.
University of Arizona is 11 miles from this motel. Crooked Tree Golf Course is 10 minutes’ drive away.  Tucson Convention Center is 15 minutes’ drive away.

name: Knights Inn Tucson D.M.A.F Area
description:
Knights Inn Tucson D.M.A.F Area is located in Tucson, within 4.3 mi of Pima Air & Space Museum and 6.2 mi of Tucson Museum of Art. The property is around 4.3 mi from Arizona Stadium, 5.6 mi from Tucson Convention Center and 2.5 mi from Reid Park Zoo. The property provides an outdoor pool, a 24-hour front desk, and free WiFi is available throughout the property.
Knights Inn Tucson D.M.A.F Area offers a business center for guest use.
Pima Air Museum is 6.2 mi from the accommodations, while Tucson Raceway Park is 9.3 mi away. The nearest airport is Tucson International Airport, 7.5 mi from Knights Inn Tucson D.M.A.F Area.

userReviews.title: Bring Your Own Linens And Water
userReviews.positive: The only thing to like was the advertised rate.
userReviews.negative:
I don't think the staff ever smiled. A sign in the lobby said to let the hotel know within 15 minutes if anything was wrong. Walking to the room, the place seemed rundown, but acceptable. None of the curtains hung straight. In the room there were only stained bath towels, no hand towels nor wash cloths. When going to bed we discovered there was only one sheet! And my friend's sheet was stained with two holes. I slept with the sheet folded in half. My friend slept with his clothes on, trying to avoid other peoples cooties. The next morning he found a guy "cleaning" a room and asked if we could get two top sheets added to our two beds.  He seemed surprised that a bed needed two sheets.  We went to his cart and found two sheets but said he couldn't access the room while guests were staying there. My friend said we would take the sheets and make the beds ourselves.
My friend checked out several things in the room since he knows electrical wiring, tested outlets, lamps and found code violations of the wiring. One lamp was missing its switch.
When we returned after the second day, the water was off. My friend complained and was told it would be back on in an hour. After dinner two hours later, still no water.  He went back to the lobby to complain.  They said it would be any time now - more like any day now.  The water did eventually come back on 3 hours later and I could hear water running thru the pipes. Later, I went to wash my hands and the water was off again. A little later, it was back on. During all this waiting time, there was quite a lot of noise in the courtyard from other "guests."  My friend went to investigate. There was a crazy woman crying and howling something unintelligible.  Other guests were out of their rooms mocking her and being very disruptive.  I guess this is what is expected on a Friday night.  
AVOID THIS PROPERTY LIKE THE PLAGUE!
userReviews.room: Queen Room with Two Queen Beds - Non-Smoking

name: Hilton Garden Inn Tucson Airport
description:
Just moments from Tucson International Airport and near downtown Tucson, Arizona, this hotel offers free 24-hour airport shuttle service as well as comfortable guestrooms and convenient amenities. Free parking is provided.
Hilton Garden Inn Tucson Airport features spacious rooms with amenities such as 32-inch flat-screen TVs and free wired and wireless high-speed internet access. Guests will appreciate spacious work areas, microwaves and refrigerators. After a long day, guests can relax while watching an on-demand movie and enjoying a meal from the hotel's evening room service.
The Great American Grill at the Tucson Airport Hilton Garden Inn serves American fare for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Guests can spend the afternoon beside the outdoor pool or in the lazy river. The hotel also features a 24-hour business center and state-of-the-art fitness center with Precor equipment.

name: Ramada by Wyndham Tucson
description:
Located 5 minutes’ drive from the Tucson Convention Center and directly off Interstate 10, this hotel offers convenient amenities such as free high-speed internet access and a spacious outdoor pool.
Ramada by Wyndham Tucson features guestrooms with microwaves and refrigerators. Each air conditioned room includes a cable TV and tea and coffee-making facilities.
Ramada by Wyndham Tucson offers tennis courts and a fitness center on-site.  After a game of tennis or a workout, guests can relax in the outdoor hot tub and enjoy the views of the surrounding mountains.
Guests at the Ramada by Wyndham Tucson are offered a full American breakfast with scrambled eggs, meat, potatoes and more. For other on-site dining options, the Terrace Cafe and Bar serves everything from Mexican cuisine to classic American dishes.
Silverbell Golf Course is 15 minutes’ drive from this hotel.  Saguaro National Park is 14 mi away.

userReviews.title: Decent hotel to stay at for convention travelers.
userReviews.positive: Decent breakfast. 5 Minute walk to the convention center so super convenient for convention travelers. Right off the freeway but did not notice traffic noise, super close to everything downtown or UofA. Courtyard rooms have a nice patio area to sit at so great during the fall to spring months. Large outdoor area that would be perfect for large business gatherings or parties. Beds and linen were good. The suites were very nice, a good value (I didn't have one but I was able to visit someone who did).
userReviews.negative: AC unit was loud and could use an update to a more efficient temperature control set up, though the room was cool enough even in the summer so it's ok. Rooms were dated and in need of TLC, chipped paint, tile, old fixtures, nothing major but overall could use a renovation sooner than later. The exterior rooms had an outside area but it was just walled off and not very attractive to use. Terrace cafe was a nice usable area for the buffet events at our convention but it could really use some attention, its just an enclosed Arizona room with no central air or anything of its own.

Little bar and cafe on premises. Arrived earlier than expected and they let me obtain my room so I could go on with my day. Pubic transportation literally across the street. userReviews.negative: I wasn't made aware at check in the time of continental breakfast ending at 930. Not a deal breaker , but had I known I would have went. Kinda weird as the attendant said she "was checking if anyone was inside".  3 hrs from checkout is a bit early to check to see if anyone is inside at 9am.

name: Hacienda del Sol Guest Ranch Resort
description:
Hacienda del Sol Guest Ranch Resort in Tucson has an outdoor swimming pool, a 24-hour front desk, as well as free WiFi throughout the property.
All rooms feature a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a private bathroom. Selected rooms provide a kitchen.
An American breakfast is served daily at the property. Guests can take advantage of a fitness center and a hot tub.
The accommodations provides a laundry service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying.
Arizona Stadium is 5.6 mi from Hacienda del Sol Guest Ranch Resort, while Tucson Convention Center is 6.8 mi away. The nearest airport is Tucson International Airport, 13 mi from the resort.

Room had a toaster but when trying to use it, the smoke detector went off continuously, so stopped using the toaster! name: Comfort Suites at Tucson Mall
description:
The Comfort Suites at Tucson Mall is centrally located one block from the Tucson Mall. Additional full-service amenities at this hotel include free local calls, free newspaper, exercise room, outdoor pool and hot tub. All suites include sitting areas with sofa sleepers, desks or tables, coffee makers, irons, ironing boards, microwaves, refrigerators and voice mail. Keep your electronic devices charged with the recharge device including AC and USB outlets provided in all guest rooms.
Business travelers will appreciate conveniences like free wireless high-speed Internet access in all rooms and access to copy and fax services. Business suites, featuring spacious work desks, ergonomic chairs and two telephone lines, are available. There are banquet and meeting rooms available to accommodate most events and business functions.
Hotel features free hot breakfast featuring eggs, meat, yogurt, fresh fruit, cereal and more, including a choice of hot waffle flavors. If you're leaving early, a Your Suite Success Grab & Go bag is available for the two hours prior to breakfast.
There is a wide variety of restaurants located less than one mile from the hotel.
This hotel is convenient to points of interest, including the Arizona State Museum, the Arizona-Sonora Desert Museum, Old Tucson Studios, Davis-Monthan Air Force Base, Tucson Electric Park, the Pima Air and Space Museum, the Tucson Convention Center and the University of Arizona. The Northwest Medical Center and Northwest Pet Clinic are both just minutes away. The hotel is only 20 miles from the Tucson International Airport.

address.full: 515 West Auto Mall Drive, Tucson, AZ 85705, United States of America

name: DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Tucson-Williams Center
description:
With suites twice the size as the average, our 526 square feet hotel rooms are putting the 'double' in DoubleTree.  Enjoy daily free hot breakfast, an outdoor gated courtyard with a heated pool and whirlpool, 24/7 fitness center, and onsite restaurant when you stay with us.
Our restaurant, Los Arboles, proudly serves several local craft brews plus Southwestern and classic American favorites.  With The Park Place Mall just under a mile away, revel in access to over 133 stores.  A short drive to The University of Arizona and Davis-Monthan Air Force Base, our convenient location is unbeatable.
We're looking forward to greeting you with warm, complimentary cookies in hand.  Welcome to The DoubleTree Inn & Suites by Hilton Tucson - Williams Center!

name: Armory Park Inn
description:
Located in Tucson, within a 17-minute walk of Tucson Convention Center and 2.1 miles of Arizona Stadium, Armory Park Inn has accommodations with a garden and free WiFi throughout the property. The property is around 3.7 miles from Reid Park Zoo, 10 miles from Pima Air & Space Museum and 11 miles from Pima Air Museum. Tucson Raceway Park is 15 miles away and Tucson City Hall is 1.1 miles from the inn.
At the inn rooms contain air conditioning, a closet, a patio with a garden view, a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV, bed linen and towels. The rooms will provide guests with a fridge.
Guests at Armory Park Inn can enjoy a buffet breakfast.
Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Tucson Museum of Art, Rialto Theatre and Pima County Public Library. The nearest airport is Tucson International Airport, 6.2 miles from Armory Park Inn.

userReviews.negative: Breakfast is not served until 8am, I think late for most vacationers who have activities planned.

userReviews.title: Wonderful stay in Tucson
userReviews.positive:
Lovely quiet location but within easy walk to restaurants. A lovely historic house with masses of charm.  The rooms were very well appointed and very comfortable and there were also lots of areas, both indoors and outdoors to relax and socialize.  Breakfast was cooked fresh and thoroughly enjoyed by all.  What made an excellent experience into a perfect experience was a lady named Dora.  Not only was she here, there and everywhere ensuring that everybody had what they needed, she somehow also managed to chat and advise about people's plans for the day.  Being a program manager I fully appreciate how much work goes into making something look easy!
If you are a person  / couple who don't like fresh home cooking or interaction during your stay then this isn't the place for you.  There are plenty of places who offer processed, pre cooked meals and no personal service.
If you are looking to visit the Tucson area and want to spend time over breakfast, eating lovely food and enjoying a social experience then I honestly don`t think you will find any better than here. Long, lazy evenings were spent in the outside seating area and were wonderful.  For once in our lives we managed to slow down time! If returning to Tucson I wouldn`t think of staying elsewhere.
Amie & Dora, keep up the great work, you deserve to succeed 100%
userReviews.negative: Everything was perfect

userReviews.title: Special Place
userReviews.positive: Incredible attention to detail was taken in both the design, finishes and amenities in the rooms.  Great linens and toiletries, comfortable bed and pillows.  Loved the history of the place (old stage coach stop) and the nod to historic Arizona pioneers by dedicating the guest rooms to different individuals who made their mark in the area. Great books to read about the area and history scattered about the common areas.  Guests are treated to a happy hour and a wonderful breakfast.  Close to all the cool downtown restaurants and shops.  We parked our car and walked to dinner.  Wish we could have stayed longer!

userReviews.title: A relaxing experience - would definitely stay there again.

userReviews.negative: Wished that the location was a little closer to downtown to enable walking to restaurants and stores.  Located in a very residential neighborhood.  However, given all of the closures and disruptions from COVID, downtown was not as vibrant as expected.

userReviews.title: One of the nicest, hotel experiences I've ever had. I will be back!

name: Comfort Suites At Sabino Canyon
description:
This hotel in Arizona is a 30-minute drive from the Tucson International Airport. Guest rooms include a refrigerator and the hotel features an outdoor heated pool and hot tub.
Every room at the Comfort Suites At Sabino Canyon is also furnished with a sitting area and microwave. Cable TV along with coffee and tea facilities are also provided.
A free hot breakfast buffet and poolside happy hour cocktails are provided. Free Wi-Fi is available. The Sabino Canyon Comfort Suites provides a fitness center and laundry facilities.
The University of Arizona is 8.2 miles from the Tucson Comfort Suites At Sabino Canyon. Guests are 25 miles from Rose Canyon Lake and 30 miles from Mount Lemmon.
